Author: BotGaming
Title: [Pre-Ann] BotGaming Postponed the Date of ICO
Body: Verifiability of odds and building users’ trust represent BotGaming core values. This is why we developed open source and blockchain based RNG aka Provably Fair Service.  It works not by conducting on-chain transactions, but inside a special game session channel, i.e. off-chain.   The service is based on the use of data from two sources, the server and the client. At the beginning of a game session, the server generates a private sequence ServerSeed and a public sequence ServerHash based on ServerSeed.  Then it records the public sequence in the Smart contract of the game (in blockchain), and thus ServerHash becomes available for the player for further integrity control of the generated random number.  The player provides their own unique sequence of symbols (ClientSeed) to the server and their Address.  The server computes a unique Nonce for each random number.  The server computes the random number from a defined range by using hash of the sequence of symbols generated by concatenation of ServerSeed, ClientSeed, Address и Nonce.  https://i.imgur.com/mqBjtqa.jpg

Author: BotGaming
Title: [Pre-Ann] BotGaming Postponed the Date of ICO
Body: BotGaming is full featured gambling platform which includes  Games Messenger based games (player vs. casino and player vs. player)  Provably Fair Service PRNG with logging operations to the blockchain and messenger based app to verify odds  Wallet Messenger based wallet supports basic crypto and fiat currencies  Loyalty program Bonus system and lotteries for token holders and players (gas recharge)  User traction S2S based user acquisition tracking and in-game analytics  Affiliate program The first blockchain powered affiliate program for messenger influencers  Artificial Intelligence Front-end: Snap screen and image recognition for in-play betting, natural language processing Back-end: AI and Big Data driven system to improve players’ retention  https://i.imgur.com/01vmQoY.jpg

Author: BotGaming
Title: [Pre-Ann] BotGaming Postponed the Date of ICO
Body: BotGaming Postponed the Date of Public Coin Offering  BotGaming, blockchain powered iGaming platform for messenger bots, has announced today that they have put off the date of the Initial Coin Offering. In the following months, the company will focus on product development and the audience growth.  The main reason for fundraising, whether be it venture capital or coin offering, is the accelerated growth of a business. Many IT entrepreneurs consider the next round of investment as a magic pill. As result, some companies lose touch with reality. BotGaming team adheres to the opposite point: the only real measurements of success are a strong business model and loyal users, rather than a market valuation or the number of funds collected.  In contrast to the majority of the projects that use ICO procedure, BotGaming has a successful track record as a social gambling business with more than 35,000 monthly active users. Those and so, the team faced with a dilemma. On the one hand, it was possible to focus for next four months all company’s resources on the ICO campaign and negotiations with stock exchanges. On the other hand, BotGaming can make a profit here and now.  Therefore, we have made a decision to develop BotGaming platform at our own expense. We will spend our funds on user acquisition and product development instead of spending money on backer attraction. In the near future, we will announce the launch of the first messenger based casino, which will accept major cryptocurrencies.  Nevertheless, we strongly believe in crypto community and consider an opportunity of using Public Token Offering in the future. We thank all those who believed in our vision and supported us. The stacks earned during the airdrop and bounty campaign will be credited to all participants as no deposit bonuses.  To find out more information please join our Telegram group.

Author: BotGaming
Title: [Pre-Ann] BotGaming Postponed the Date of ICO
Body: https://i.imgur.com/PtUH4mi.jpg Website·Whitepaper·Telegram·Medium·Twitter·GitHub·Bounty  BotGaming Postponed the Date of Public Coin Offering  BotGaming, blockchain powered iGaming platform for messenger bots, has announced today that they have put off the date of the Initial Coin Offering. In the following months, the company will focus on product development and the audience growth.  The main reason for fundraising, whether be it venture capital or coin offering, is the accelerated growth of a business. Many IT entrepreneurs consider the next round of investment as a magic pill. As result, some companies lose touch with reality. BotGaming team adheres to the opposite point: the only real measurements of success are a strong business model and loyal users, rather than a market valuation or the number of funds collected.  In contrast to the majority of the projects that use ICO procedure, BotGaming has a successful track record as a social gambling business with more than 35,000 monthly active users. Those and so, the team faced with a dilemma. On the one hand, it was possible to focus for next four months all company’s resources on the ICO campaign and negotiations with stock exchanges. On the other hand, BotGaming can make a profit here and now.  Therefore, we have made a decision to develop BotGaming platform at our own expense. We will spend our funds on user acquisition and product development instead of spending money on backer attraction. In the near future, we will announce the launch of the first messenger based casino, which will accept major cryptocurrencies.  Nevertheless, we strongly believe in crypto community and consider an opportunity of using Public Token Offering in the future. We thank all those who believed in our vision and supported us. The stacks earned during the airdrop and bounty campaign will be credited to all participants as no deposit bonuses.  To find out more information please join our Telegram group.  WHAT IS BOTGAMING BotGaming is a blockchain powered gambling platform for messenger bots. Verifiability of odds and building users' trust represent our core values. This is why BotGaming has been built using open source PNRG to make interactions inside the game session transparent and verifiable. BotGaming uses blockchain protocol at the game’s session level. Once the game session begins, all transactions like slot machine spins or poker hands are gas-free and are processed almost instantaneously.  WHAT PROBLEMS DOES BOTGAMING SOLVE Despite the high rates of growth of the industry, trust in online gambling is lacking. This problem covers all aspects of the gambling industry, from PRNG to payments. The combination of open source PRNG and the processing of all external transactions using the blockchain ensures provably fair gambling.  Mobile device users spend up to 70% of time using messenger apps, which make them especially promising to use as a mobile gambling platforms. A user doesn’t need to install a new application and ad traffic for messengers is significantly cheaper than usual mobile traffic.  Try out our games for Telegram Poker Slotmachine Instant Lottery P2P Totalizator  SUCCESSFUL TRACK RECORD We started the development of the games for messengers in 2016, and initially we focused on a social gambling business model with monetization driven solely by in-app purchases. Our products were mentioned by Forbes, TechCrunch and CNet. Moreover, Pokerbot is considered to be the #1 bot on Telegram. Today the total number of our bots installed on all platforms exceeds 400,000, with more than 35,000 monthly active users.  After our ICO we will create a fully-featured gambling platform for messenger apps by obtaining a Gambling License and using our token as ingame currency.  WHAT IS A BOT TOKEN USED FOR BOT is an utility token based on ERC20 standards. The key feature of the token is its’ use as ingame currency. It will be a purely utility token and cannot be considered as a security.  https://i.imgur.com/3tXspWa.png  Website Whitepaper Telegram Medium Twitter GitHub

Author: BotGaming
Title: [Pre-Ann] BotGaming Postponed the Date of ICO
Body: I know, it's look crazy  John Koetsier form Forbes wrote that BotGaming is a geekiest thing that he have seen at WebSummit https://twitter.com/johnkoetsier/status/928285203394715648  But we have 35,000 monthly active users just now.  Jokes aside. One of the main growth drivers of the gambling market are is moving players to mobile devices. But, major mobile platforms like the AppStore and Google Play ban online casinos in many countries.  You can add to this expensive user acquisition. The average cost for a new depositing player is $100 for poker and $300 for most online casinos.  But look around. Last 5 years were years of the messengers rise. An average user spends in messengers up to 70% of all his time spending online.  Users have an extremely low barrier to entry to try out our games. They don’t need to install a new app. It’s easy. You can play in your messenger. Just two taps and our game will start. As result, we have extremely low cost of user acquisition - $0.1 for social. Our cost per depositing real money player is estimated at be $5.

Author: BotGaming
Title: [Pre-Ann] BotGaming Postponed the Date of ICO
Body: BotGaming has been selected to present at Pitch ICE event  Since its inception Pitch ICE has allowed most interesting gaming, gambling and technology start-ups to introduce their companies to the industry’s key influencers.  Come to the Game Design Theatre N7–450 on February 7 at 12 pm to hear our pitch about the project. The award winning show ICE Totally Gaming returns on the 6–8 February 2018 to ExCeL London. ICE 2017 delivered a record audited total attendance of 30,213, up 6% year-on-year, further increasing the reputation of ICE as the most international business event anywhere in gaming.  The event address: ExCeL London, Royal Victoria Dock, 1 Western Gateway, London, E16 1XL, United Kingdom. Read more about the event on the ICE website.  See you there!
